activate.ChoosePassPhrase:
Khetha ibinzana lokugqitha ukuze ungene ngalo.
Ibinzana elilula elinamagama ambalwa oza kuwakhumbula ngokulula.
activate.ChoosePassPhraseSeeSuggestions: Khetha ibinzana lokupasa elilungileyo ukukhusela iakhawunti yakho. Jonga iingcebiso ngezinye izimvo.
activate.IfYouFeel: Ukuba uvakalelwa kukuba kukho into engahambi kakuhle, unako

notifications.title: Imvume
notifications.prompt: Ngaba uyafuna ukwenza izaziso zisebenze? Uya kufumana uhlaziyo lwexesha lokwenyani malunga nezinto ozikhathaleleyo.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Wamkelekile! Nceda uqinisekise idilesi yemeyile yakho.
notifications.CompletedActivationLogIn: Ugqibile ukusebenzisa umsebenzisi. Zama ukungena ngoku.

login.title: Wamkelekile
login.resendConfirm: Ngaba uyafuna ukuthumela umyalezo ukuseta ngokutsha ibinzana lakho lokugqithisa?
login.resendSuccess: Jonga umyalezo wokuseta ngokutsha ibinzana lakho lokugqithisa
login.noPassphrase: Ngaphambi kokuba ungene, kufuneka usete ibinzana lokugqitha ngokucofa ikhonkco kumyalezo wakho wokuvula.
login.notVerified: Kufuneka uzithumele umyalezo wokuvula ukuze ungene.
login.emailExists: Ngaba ukhe wazama ukubhalisa ngale imeyile ngaphambili? Ukuba kunjalo, khangela ibhokisi yakho yokungenayo ukuze uvule iakhawunti yakho. Cofa ukuthumela kwakhona umyalezo
login.mobileExists: Ngaba ukhe wazama ukubhalisa ngale nombolo yeselula ngaphambili? Ukuba kunjalo, jonga iSMS yakho ukuze uvule iakhawunti yakho. Cofa ukuthumela kwakhona umyalezo
login.facebookNoEmail: Iakhawunti yakho ye-facebook iswele idilesi ye-imeyile eqinisekisiweyo. Ngena ngokulula ngendlela yasekhaya.

alert.title: Isalathisa kwakhona kwiWalethi
alert.content: Nje ukuba uvale le ncoko yababini, uya kuthathwa kwiwalethi yakho. Emva kokuba ungene, buyela kweli phepha.

placeholders.identifier: ngenisa i-# yakho yeselula okanye i-imeyile
